com.camerontec.catalys.server.sessionmanager

Class CIDRNotationChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.sessionmanager.CIDRNotationChecker

  • public class CIDRNotationChecker
extends Object
    CIDR: Classless Inter-Domain Routing

    Organizes IP addresses into subnetworks:

    xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx/n

    Where n is the number of left-most bits in the subnet mask, for example:

    192.168.12.0/23 contains 2^(32-23) = 512 addresses therefore:
    192.168.12.0 ... 192.168.12.255 + 192.168.13.0 ... 192.168.13.255
    which is equivalent to using 255.255.254.0 as submask with addresses starting at 192.168.12.0

    Author:
    Miguel Arregui (miguel.arregui@gmail.com)
